scripts.build: yarn run validate && yarn run build:generate
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:type-check && yarn run validate:lint && yarn run validate:unit-test

dependenciesComments.clsx: A runtime library for constructing conditional class attribute strings from JavaScript objects and arrays.
dependenciesComments.date-fns: A runtime library for date and time manipulation.
dependenciesComments.preact: Preact; a virtual DOM-based UI library with JSX support inspired by React. It is a runtime dependency, as it provides the API for mounting the web app onto the DOM.
dependenciesComments.tailwindcss: Tailwind CSS; a utility-first CSS framework. It is a runtime dependency, as it provides a CSS reset and helper rules in the CSS distribution.
dependenciesComments.tslib: A runtime library that optimises TypeScript applications.

devDependenciesComments.@babel/core: Babel; a JavaScript compiler. It is a peer dependency of '@preact/preset-vite'.
devDependenciesComments.@babel/plugin-transform-react-jsx: A Babel plugin that supports Preact-compatible JSX transformations. It is a peer dependency of '@preact/preset-vite'.
devDependenciesComments.@jest/types: A set of type definitions for the Jest configuration.
devDependenciesComments.@preact/preset-vite: A Vite plugin for Preact applications that supports hot module replacement (HMR) and Preact Devtools.
devDependenciesComments.@testing-library/dom: DOM Testing Library; a library that unit tests web applications through their user accessibility via the DOM. It is a peer dependency of '@testing-library/user-event'.
devDependenciesComments.@testing-library/jest-dom: A Testing Library add-on that provides DOM assertion matchers in Jest.
devDependenciesComments.@testing-library/preact: Preact Testing Library; a library that unit tests Preact applications through their user accessibility.
devDependenciesComments.@testing-library/preact-hooks: A Testing Library add-on that renders custom hooks in Preact applications.
devDependenciesComments.@testing-library/user-event: A Testing Library add-on that provides more advanced simulations of user events than the built-in 'fireEvent' function.
devDependenciesComments.@types/html-minifier-terser: A set of type definitions for HTMLMinifier.
devDependenciesComments.@types/jest: A set of type definitions for test suites in Jest.
devDependenciesComments.@types/node: A set of type definitions for Node modules to be used in configuration files and test stubs.
devDependenciesComments.@types/tailwindcss: A set of type definitions for the Tailwind CSS configuration.
devDependenciesComments.@types/testing-library__jest-dom: A set of type definitions for the assertion matchers provided by Testing Library.
devDependenciesComments.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in TypeScript code. It must match the version of '@typescript-eslint/parser'.
devDependenciesComments.@typescript-eslint/parser: An ESLint plugin that lets it parse TypeScript sources. It must match the version of '@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin'.
devDependenciesComments.autoprefixer: A PostCSS plugin that adds browser vendor prefixes to CSS rules according to the 'browserslist' entry in 'package.json'. It is a peer dependency of 'tailwindcss'.
devDependenciesComments.babel-plugin-transform-hook-names: A Babel plugin that allows the Preact Devtools to display hook names. It is a peer dependency of '@preact/preset-vite'.
devDependenciesComments.eslint: ESLint; a static program analysis tool that uncovers issues in JavaScript code.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-compat: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in browser compability according to the 'browserslist' entry in 'package.json'.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-jest: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in test suites in Jest.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-jest-dom: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in the use of assertion matchers provided by Testing Library.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-jest-formatting: An ESLint plugin that uncovers code style issues in test suites in Jest.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-react: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in React-like applications and JSX code.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-react-hooks: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in the use of React-like hooks.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-testing-library: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in the use of Testing Library.
devDependenciesComments.html-minifier-terser: HTMLMinifier; a minification tool that lets Vite reduce the output size of 'index.html'.
devDependenciesComments.postcss: PostCSS; a processing tool for CSS. It is a peer dependency of 'tailwindcss'.
devDependenciesComments.ts-jest: A Jest transformer that supports Preact-compatible JSX and TypeScript, including source maps and debugging in IntelliJ IDEA.
devDependenciesComments.typescript: TypeScript; a statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
devDependenciesComments.vite: Vite; a frontend build tool with native support for JSX, TypeScript, and PostCSS. '@preact/preset-vite' is not compatible with version 2.7.0 and newer.
